data.title: Cannabis Control Appeals Panel Announces Teleconference Call Meeting
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Cannabis Control Appeals Panel (CCAP) will conduct a panel meeting via teleconference on Monday, April 29th at 1:30 p.m. Please see the link below for the agenda and teleconference locations. https://www.ccap.ca.gov/about/meetings/agendas/20190429.pdf If you have any questions, you can call the CCAP’s main phone number at 916-322-6870, or email at info@ccap.ca.gov. Notice to the Public: The public […]
